text: Toshirō Mifune (Japanese: 三船 敏郎 Mifune Toshirō – IPA: [miɸɯne toɕiɺoː]) (1 April 1920 – 24 December 1997) was a Japanese actor. He had roles in almost 170 movies. == Other websites == === In English === * Toshirō Mifune - Tribute Site * Toshirō Mifune: Biographical details and selected filmography at the British Film Institute * === In Japanese === * http://www.mifuneproductions.co.jp/mifune.html - Official Toshirō Mifune Website * Toshirō Mifune at the Japanese Movie Database Category:1920 births Category:1997 deaths Category:Deaths from multiple organ failure Category:Japanese movie actors
title: Toshirō Mifune
